title: The Great Old One
content: 5d8Fire Create a blazing wall of fire, burning anyone who dares stand too close. 18m DEX Save Concentration Cone of Cold Lvl 5 Evocation ActionLevel 5 Warlock Spell Slot 8d8Cold Make a flurry of frost, crisp air, and condensed snow crystals erupt from your hands. On Save: Targets still take half damage. 9m CON Save Dominate Person Lvl 5 Enchantment ActionLevel 5 Warlock Spell Slot Make a humanoid fight alongside you.
